duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the technical work of the Hardware Technicians team and support HW validation testing, RMA (field returns) analysis, proto fabrication, rework for proto builds, cable fabrication for testing, and tester equipment fabrication support.
Manage overall Hardware Lab, including equipment maintenance, proposal/purchasing of new Engineering equipment, and lab repairs.
Coach, develop, and mentor employees, conduct employee performance evaluations, and support other managerial tasks of team as needed.
Create custom Hardware validation test plans for Device and component level qualifications to meet product requirements in various automotive environments.
Support validation and approval of alternate/second source components for the devices, including component selection, recommendation, and validation.
Manage quarterly/yearly validation of mass production products in Hardware Sustaining Engineering, focusing on finding quality and manufacturing issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical engineering or similar subject area, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
